input.sentences: we decided to go all out for the kids birthday .
in the afternoon the kids played games outside .
then the cake was brought out .
it was so cool | no one wanted to eat it .
we decided to get a good family picture with it before cutting in .
output.sentences: The kids at the birthday party were silly and decided to play.
All the kids had fun and played games together.
They brought the cake made by a the local grocer.
The room was cool as everyone began to eat the cake.
Everyone in the family stood together and decided to capture the moment with a picture.
